Major_Arcs.title: The Human Meteor's First Case
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor and his initial adventures, starting with an underwater mystery and leading to a yacht investigation and confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Mystery and Taxi Ride Setup
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene establishes the underwater setting, introduces the Human Meteor, and shifts to Duke, the taxi driver, setting up the initial plot.

sub_scenes.title: Resolving Cop Shooters and Yacht Plot Initiation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Human Meteor dealing with the 'cop shooters', positive police response, and introduces the new yacht plotline with Duke and Toby's plan.

narrative_arcs.title: Toby Infiltrates the Yacht and is Spotted

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Infiltration and Underwater Conflict
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Toby's yacht infiltration, his discovery of the submarine plot, and Human Meteor's underwater battle with divers.

narrative_arcs.title: Human Meteor Responds to the Call
Divers Identify and Target Human Meteor
Human Meteor Responds to Divers' Aggression
Diver's Threat and Human Meteor's Retaliation Hint
Spear Gun Attack and Cry for Help
Human Meteor's Torpedo Attack on Submarine
Human Meteor's Finishing Blow to Ship

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Investigation and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the Human Meteor's initial story, focusing on the yacht investigation, Peter's death, depth map search, and final domestic scene.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Peter's Death on Yacht
Human Meteor Searches for Depth Map in Peter's Cabin
Evening Car Ride and Domestic Scene with Toby and Duke

Major_Arcs.title: The Liberty Lads and the Nazi Plot
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Liberty Lads and their fight against Nazis, interwoven with a parallel storyline of two boys' investigation.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Confrontation and Boys' Wallet Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Liberty Lads in action against Nazis and starts the boys' investigation with the ambulance and dropped wallet.

narrative_arcs.title: Marine Salutes Civilian - Major Bronson Revealed

sub_scenes.title: Garage Encounter and Conspiracy Unveiled
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the boys' arrival at the garage, their tense encounter with Mr. Horst, and the overheard carbon monoxide plot.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Garage and Interception
Confirmation and Agreement on Carbon Monoxide Plan

sub_scenes.title: Garage Chaos and Sabotage Plot Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the fight in the garage, escalating threats, and the boys uncovering the larger sabotage conspiracy.

narrative_arcs.title: Plan to Seek Help and Sergeant Encounter

sub_scenes.title: Barracks Emergency and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the urgent response at the Marine Barracks, Skip's defense, and Major Bronson's confrontation and rescue.

narrative_arcs.title: Urgent News and Car Crash at Barracks
Immediate Aid and Call for Ambulance

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ in South America: Rosita's Rescue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces 'The Champ' and Henry in South America, caught in intrigue, and their mission to rescue Rosita from Nazi-linked bandits.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Military Interrogation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces 'The Champ' and Henry in South America and sets up the plot with military interrogation and kidnapping revelation.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Setting

sub_scenes.title: Kidnapping and Misguided Welcome
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts El Tigre's men kidnapping 'The Champ' and Henry and their arrival at the house where they are mistaken for rescuers.

narrative_arcs.title: El Tigre's Demands and Forced Carjacking
The Forced Drive and Destination Reveal

sub_scenes.title: Planning and Infiltration at El Tigre's Hideout
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Mama's plea for help, planning at Tamale Street, and the infiltration of El Tigre's hideout.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Rescue Mission Plan
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts confrontations at El Tigre's hideout, the plan to rescue Rosita, and the start of the rescue mission.

narrative_arcs.title: Claim of Identity Theft by Axis Agents
Rosita Held by Axis Agents, Rescue Plan

sub_scenes.title: Rosita's Rescue and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the action-packed rescue of Rosita, the ensuing fight, and the final resolution with gratitude and future outlook.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape to Citadel and Hotel Strategy

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in the Jungle: Submarine Plans
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, his disobedience, and his crucial mission regarding submarine plans.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Jungle Ambush
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Devil Dog Dolan fighting in the jungle and sets up the conflict with his disobedience and possession of submarine plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle River Journey and Perceived Danger

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Interrogation, and Torture for Plans
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Dolan's capture, the interrogation by Grauer, and the torture to force him to reveal the submarine plans.

sub_scenes.title: Sabotage and Native Conflict
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Dolan's sabotage activities, the arson, Grauer's plan to eliminate natives, and the ensuing conflict with the natives.

narrative_arcs.title: Marines' Onslaught and Grauer's Strategic Talk
Grauer's Dismissal and Native Hut Burning

sub_scenes.title: Military Surrender and Mutiny Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the Devil Dog Dolan story with the surrender orders, father-son confrontation, shipboard fight, and disciplinary resolution.

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins: The Case of Blood and Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and their investigation into a murder case, focusing on blood transfusion, racketeering, and community support.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Investigation Start
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Twinkle Twins and initiates their investigation into the Robert Burgess murder case.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead
Hospital Visit and Discovery of Miss Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Blood Mystery and Racketeering Suspicions
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene deepens the mystery with blood transfusion issues, racketeering suspicions, and the Twins deciding to seek Tom Reilly.

sub_scenes.title: Chase and Community Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features the Twins searching for Tom Reilly, their conversation with Mrs. Murphy, and the chase and subsequent blockade by the community.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Tom Reilly and Initial Encounter
Conversation with Mrs. Murphy about Farnacci
Arrival and Chase of Tom Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Emergency and Community Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the Twinkle Twins story with the hospital emergency, community blood donation, Tom Reilly's recovery, and the capture of Farnacci.

narrative_arcs.title: Rushed to Ambulance and Onward Concern
Hospital Wait and Blood Transfusion News
Community Rushes to Donate and Hospital Anxiety
Blood Type Confirmation, Transfusion Preparation, and Recovery
Threats and Determination to Capture Farnacci
Police Respond and Arrest the Murderer
